sentences.en: A deep ravine is on the left of the road.
sentences.cn: 有一道深沟在马路左边.

sentences.en: Along the ravine there was a mule path.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条深谷有一条羊肠小路.

sentences.en: Alpine Valley ravine, rolling peaks, plunging valleys, waterfalls and vegetation intact.
sentences.cn: 谷内高山深谷 、 群峰连绵 、 峡谷苍茫 、 瀑布飞流、植被完好.

sentences.en: Heave the rocks into the ravine.
sentences.cn: 把这些石头扔进深谷里.

sentences.en: It'snot just that a gulf exists in living standards— there's a psychological ravine.
sentences.cn: 不仅仅是生活水平上存在巨大差异，心理上也有鸿沟。

sentences.en: Latitude 30 degrees here on countless nature secret, today introduced Sichuan Ravine.
sentences.cn: 北纬30度,这里集中了无数大自然的秘密, 今天向大家介绍四川的黑竹沟.

sentences.en: Mystic lakes and sparkling waterfalls captivate your eyes as you enter the ravine.
sentences.cn: 当你步入沟中,便可见瀑布舒洒碧玉.

sentences.en: Saul the city of Amalek and set ambush the ravine.
sentences.cn: 扫罗到了亚玛力的京城、在谷中设下埋伏.

sentences.en: She went into the ravine, together with the jewels.
sentences.cn: 她连同那些珠宝一起掉进峡谷里了.

sentences.en: She's alive! But she's way down there in the ravine.
sentences.cn: 她还活着! 但是她掉到峡谷里了.

sentences.en: The bus is said to have over-turned and fallen into a ravine.
sentences.cn: 据说巴士发生翻车，跌进了峡谷。

sentences.en: The bus is said to have overturned and fallen into a ravine.
sentences.cn: 据说巴士发生翻车，跌进了峡谷。

sentences.en: The bus overturned and fell into a ravine.
sentences.cn: 这辆公共汽车翻了车，掉进了一处深谷。

sentences.en: The continuous flow of the brook formed a ravine.
sentences.cn: 溪水不断流经之处成为峡谷.

sentences.en: The soldiers shot down into the ravine.
The yield difference between ravine rainforest and secondary forest was not significant.
sentences.cn: 沟谷雨林和次生林下阳春砂仁果实产量差异不显著.

trans.tran_en: a deep narrow valley with steep sides
